001package net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils;
002
003public class Threads {
004
005    private Threads() {
006    }
007
008    public static void runAsynchronously(Runnable runnable) {
009        new Thread(runnable).start();
010    }
011
012    public static void sleepSilently(long millis) {
013        if (millis <= 0) {
014            return;
015        }
016        try {
017            Thread.sleep(millis);
018        } catch (InterruptedException cause) {
019            Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
020        }
021    }
022
023}
